blogentries.title: Eliza’s green cookies
blogentries.content:
A world based on local, self-sufficient economies,
in small, collaborating communities,
within smaller, integrated countries,
with less resource exploitation,
less material values,
slow transportation and logistics,
human business models,
focus on human culture,
and a simple way of life.
